mapper.select: SELECT a.att_num, a.emp_num, e.emp_name, a.go_work, a.leave_work, a.break_time, TRUNC((a.leave_work - a.go_work) * 24) work_time FROM ATTENDANCE a INNER JOIN emp e ON a.emp_num = e.emp_num INNER JOIN request_history rh ON a.att_num = rh.request_num WHERE e.EMP_NUM = 2222 AND rh.state != 0 order by go_work desc;

SELECT a.att_num, a.emp_num, e.emp_name, a.go_work, a.leave_work, a.break_time, TRUNC((a.leave_work - a.go_work) * 24) work_time FROM attendance a JOIN emp e ON a.emp_num = e.emp_num where e.emp_num=#{empNum} AND to_char(a.go_work,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= #{startDate} AND to_char(a.leave_work,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= #{endDate} order by a.go_work desc
